items.title: Awesome Datascience
items.content_text:

*   [NASDAQ:DATA](https://data.nasdaq.com/) - Nasdaq Data Link A premier source for financial, economic and alternative datasets.
*   [National Centers for Environmental Information](https://www.ncei.noaa.gov/)

items.title: Awesome Zsh Plugins
items.content_text:
### Plugins / [superconsole](https://github.com/alexchmykhalo/superconsole) - Windows-only

*   [goenv (heyvito) (⭐1)](https://github.com/heyvito/goenv.zsh) - Automatically reads `.goenv` files in the current directory and sets `GOPRIVATE` environment variables.
items.content_html:
Plugins / superconsole - Windows-only

  • goenv (heyvito) (⭐1) - Automatically reads .goenv files in the current directory and sets GOPRIVATE environment variables.

items.title: Awesome Blazor
items.content_text:
### Videos / Others

*   [Rapid development model for Blazor Web Assembly and typed end-to-end services](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BcQqCzm4tK0) - ![duration](https://img.shields.io/badge/Duration:%20-10%20min-%230094FF?style=flat-square\&cacheSeconds=maxAge\&logo=youtube) May 19, 2022 - In this video we use the [ServiceStack](https://servicestack.net/) Blazor WASM template to show how the combination of typed end-to-end services and Blazor is great for building line of business applications. The template provides a clean separation of concerns, typed end-to-end safety and rapid iteration thanks to shared C# language, Visual Studio Hot Reload and [ServiceStack](https://servicestack.net/) message centric design.
items.content_html:
Videos / Others

  • Rapid development model for Blazor Web Assembly and typed end-to-end services - May 19, 2022 - In this video we use the ServiceStack Blazor WASM template to show how the combination of typed end-to-end services and Blazor is great for building line of business applications. The template provides a clean separation of concerns, typed end-to-end safety and rapid iteration thanks to shared C# language, Visual Studio Hot Reload and ServiceStack message centric design.

items.title: Awesome Db Tools
items.content_text:
### GUI

*   [Query.me](https://query.me) - Collaborative SQL editor in Notebook format. Let's you reference query results using JINJA, visualize data, and schedule runs and exports.

### CLI

*   [sqlite-utils (⭐1.9k)](https://github.com/simonw/sqlite-utils) - CLI tools for manipulating SQLite database files - inserting data, running queries, creating indexes, configuring full-text search and more.

### API / Samples

*   [PostGraphile (⭐13k)](https://github.com/graphile/postgraphile) - Instantly spin-up a GraphQL API server by pointing PostGraphile at your existing PostgreSQL database.

### Application platforms / Samples

*   [Appsmith (⭐37k)](https://github.com/appsmithorg/appsmith) - Powerful open source low code framework to build internal applications really quickly.

### SQL / Über SQL

*   [Trino (⭐12k)](https://github.com/trinodb/trino) - Trino is a distributed SQL query engine designed to query large data sets distributed over one or more heterogeneous data sources.
items.content_html:
GUI

  • Query.me - Collaborative SQL editor in Notebook format. Let's you reference query results using JINJA, visualize data, and schedule runs and exports.

CLI

  • sqlite-utils (⭐1.9k) - CLI tools for manipulating SQLite database files - inserting data, running queries, creating indexes, configuring full-text search and more.

API / Samples

  • PostGraphile (⭐13k) - Instantly spin-up a GraphQL API server by pointing PostGraphile at your existing PostgreSQL database.

Application platforms / Samples

  • Appsmith (⭐37k) - Powerful open source low code framework to build internal applications really quickly.

SQL / Über SQL

  • Trino (⭐12k) - Trino is a distributed SQL query engine designed to query large data sets distributed over one or more heterogeneous data sources.
